title: Darren Walker
itunes:title: Darren Walker
description:
Darren Walker, Ford Foundation president, talks about social justice, equality in the boardoom and how billionaires give away their money.

This episode of "The David Rubenstein Show: Peer-to-Peer Conversations" was recorded Dec. 13.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
